Key Match Events: Cody Bellinger homered to cap a seven-run second inning
Pete Crow-Armstrong's ensuing two-run double put the Cubs up 3-2
Ian Happ’s fielder’s choice grounder scored Michael Busch
Bellinger punctuated the inning with his 14th homer of the season
Post-Match Reflections: Jake Irvin tied a career high by allowing seven runs
José Tena hit a two-run double in the first for Washington
Cody Crews ripped the first pitch of the third inning into the visitor’s bullpen in left for his second home run
CJ Abrams is hitting.178 with a.243 on-base percentage since making his first All-Star appearance last month
Miscellaneous Highlights: Washington pushed three runs across in the ninth inning against relievers Tyson Miller and Drew Smyly
Keegan Thompson entered to strike out Crews and record his second save
